creator: kakkadk@yahoo.com
text:
Tomcat conf files have a hard-coded tomcat_home in each conf directory files. 
Shouldn't configuration use a variable similar to $TOMCAT_HOME and evaluate it a 
run time? It would be a really nice add-on to have a variable substitution in 
conf files for path to tomcat_home in 3.x as well as 4.x and all versions going 
forward. Thanks for your time to evaluate this enhancement request.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
The variable substitution in conf file _is_ implemented ( but not very well
documented ) :-)
It uses the same mechanism with ant, with <property name=... value=... />,
and all properties are stored as ContextManager attributes.
( note this is not a "supported" feature )
